Trial_Design.evidence: Monocentric retrospective study on 26 patients affected by head and neck paragangliomas

Participants.evidence: 26 patients affected by head and neck paragangliomas

Intervention.evidence: preoperatively treated with internal carotid artery stents

Objective.evidence: the indications and results of preoperative internal carotid artery stenting should be critically assessed

Number_Analysed.evidence: 26 patients affected by head and neck paragangliomas

Result_Outcome.evidence: Gross total tumor resection was possible in 85% of cases

Harms.evidence: The stent complication rate was less than 3.1%
